Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150 by many of our customers. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its high value and benefits, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $135. This is a special opportunity to own this item at a discount, so please let me know if you're interested. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $135. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $135
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
